main.name: Udenna Nebeolisa
main.description: I am a front-end web development engineer
main.bio: I am a Full-Stack Software Engineer, with previous experience in the IT industry, and have a passion for innovation and a relentless drive for continuous improvement in all of my endeavors. After coding in Roblox as a hobby for years since childhood, early this year, I finally decided to become serious about Software Engineering and took a 15-week immersive course at Flatiron School to jumpstart this pivot in my career. It has truly been an experience to learn so much in a short amount of time and I'm excited to continue this learning journey. I aspire to achieve the objectives of the organization through hard work, sincerity, and creativity by exploring the potentials available in the world and being an asset for it. I strongly believe that the key to success is passion, willingness to learn, and humility.

resume.skillmessage: Current skills im using and/or learning

education.description: Fully immersive Software Engineering program where I learned current front-end and back-end technologies.

The Field of Study in Computer Science consists of academic courses leading to an Associate of Arts degree.  The student looking at computers can later be transferred and applied towards a Bachelors degree in Computer Science or Computer Management Information System.

work.title: Software Engineer I
work.description: Developed software applications in the Order Management System (OMS) using Java, Node.js, JavaScript, and React. Ensured optimal functionality and quality through thorough testing and QA. Led the development of a secure TCP network infrastructure. Mentored junior engineers, fostering a culture of growth and collaboration.

work.title: Co-Founding Software Developer
work.description: Led product development at a startup, gaining experience in Ruby, Node.js, Ruby on Rails, AWS, and GCP. Utilized AWS and GCP to enhance product scalability and performance. Led migration of the application to AWS, improving scalability and security.

work.title: Computer Repair Technician
work.description: Assisted in various IT-related jobs including cable running, server management, cable management, internet setup, phone setup and motherboard replacement.

work.title: Computer Technician
work.description: Reviewed customers complaints to determine the details of equipment problems, Reviewed customers complaints to determine the details of equipment problems, Completed repair tickets, Installed and configured new equipment, including operating software or peripheral equipment as required.
